MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://9d213d3befca47da33f6db0310826bcdb148299805c10d77175ecfe1d06a9a68","dweb:/ipfs/QmRgCn6SP1hbBkExUADFuDo8xkT4UU47yjNF5FhCeRbQmS"]},"../../node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/Address.sol":{"keccak256":"0x006dd67219697fe68d7fbfdea512e7c4cb64a43565ed86171d67e844982da6fa","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://2455248c8ddd9cc6a7af76a13973cddf222072427e7b0e2a7d1aff345145e931","dweb:/ipfs/QmfYjnjRbWqYpuxurqveE6HtzsY1Xx323J428AKQgtBJZm"]},"src/interfaces/IHedgedVault.sol":{"keccak256":"0x8c147e07c7a82dcfc6310fab4a47b679a016f10aa9307dc1ac33b66786e07b80","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://58ec4e1c824cfa414fdea35343bd019759b1685520ff7b7b01c2824362febb01","dweb:/ipfs/QmPT69VNYfWmaXmKmhh6DD7zBG2QjfpRjb27S7rDgBLbaJ"]},"src/libraries/SwapExecutor.sol":{"keccak256":"0x1cb7fc7384ba601ba288b68bc05b621984ddb78557e86bcfd07777f4490bd556","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://7cb47266b24304064ab48aa4464ab4ed7191c7002cdb3b9c8774d1535cabfdf0","dweb:/ipfs/QmeN3GZ81kTrsQ6vtGhnw5UuZt6hJabD5bwN4G5DgiXvuX"]}},"version":1}

allowance(address,address).details: Returns the remaining number of tokens that `spender` will be allowed to spend on behalf of `owner` through {transferFrom}. This is zero by default. This value changes when {approve} or {transferFrom} are called.

approve(address,uint256).details: Sets `amount` as the allowance of `spender` over the caller's tokens. Returns a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded. IMPORTANT: Beware that changing an allowance with this method brings the risk that someone may use both the old and the new allowance by unfortunate transaction ordering. One possible solution to mitigate this race condition is to first reduce the spender's allowance to 0 and set the desired value afterwards: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/20#issuecomment-263524729 Emits an {Approval} event.

balanceOf(address).details: Returns the amount of tokens owned by `account`.

depositExecute((address,bytes,uint256)[].details: Deploys to AMM and adjusts hedge. Can execute swaps before deployment.

params.swapCalls: Array of swaps to execute (e.g. USDC -> WETH)

params._paused: True to pause, false to unpause

totalSupply().details: Returns the amount of tokens in existence.

transfer(address,uint256).details: Moves `amount` tokens from the caller's account to `to`. Returns a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded. Emits a {Transfer} event.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Moves `amount` tokens from `from` to `to` using the allowance mechanism. `amount` is then deducted from the caller's allowance. Returns a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded. Emits a {Transfer} event.

withdrawExecute((address,bytes,uint256)[.details: Withdraws from AMM and adjusts hedge. Can execute swaps after withdrawal.

params.minAmountOut: Minimum USDC expected after withdrawal and swaps
params.swapCalls: Array of swaps to execute (e.g. WETH -> USDC)

accrueMarginFees().notice: Accrue margin fees for open hedge

calculateAMMDelta().notice: Calculate current ETH delta from AMM position

depositExecute((address,bytes,uint256)[].notice: Execute pending deposit (step 2 of 2, controller only)

emergencyExit().notice: Emergency exit - close all positions and return to USDC

emergencyExitTriggered().notice: Check if emergency exit was triggered

rebalanceAMM().notice: Rebalance AMM position when out of range

withdrawExecute((address,bytes,uint256)[.notice: Execute pending withdrawal (step 2 of 2, controller only)
